      • sqlToJson

        public void sqlToJson(FieldsInterface inData,
                      DbDriver driver,
                      boolean useCompactFormat,
                      JSONWriter writer)
        Create a elements of a josn array directly from the output of this sql
        Parameters:
        inData - source of values for inut fields
        driver -
        useCompactFormat - if true, a header array is written first with column names, followed by an array of values for each row. If false, an object is written for each row.
        writer -
